PmStartText: Hey {0}, ğŸ¥€ Welcome to {1}! Version: v{2} A fast, reliable and powerful Telegram music bot built with amazing features. Supported Platforms: YouTube, Spotify, Apple Music and SoundCloud.
StartText: Hello {0}, ğŸ¥€ {1} is now active and ready to play music! ğŸ”Š â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ Need help or got questions? Join our Support Chat â€” we're here for you! ğŸ’¬
UserCommands: Available Commands for Users: /start â€“ Start the bot. /play [song name or reply to audio] â€“ Play music in voice chat. /vplay [song name or reply to video] â€“ Play video in voice chat. /privacy â€“ View privacy policy. /lang â€“ Change the bot's language.
AdminCommands: Available Commands for Admins: /skip â€“ Skip the current track. /pause â€“ Pause the music. /resume â€“ Resume playback. /end â€“ Stop the stream. /remove [x] â€“ Remove the xth song from the queue. /seek [seconds] â€“ Seek to a specific time. /mute â€“ Mute the stream. /unmute â€“ Unmute the stream. /volume [1-200] â€“ Adjust volume. /loop [1 to 10 or 0] â€“ Loop the current song (0 to disable). /queue â€“ Show the song queue. /clear â€“ Clear the queue. /speed [0.5-4.0] â€“ Adjust playback speed. /song [song name or reply to audio] â€“ Download song from YouTube or Spotify. /setplaytype [0 or 1] â€“ Set the default play type.
ChatOwnerCommands: Chat Owner Commands: /auth [reply] â€“ Authorize a user to use admin commands. /unauth [reply] â€“ Revoke a user's authorization. /authlist â€“ Show the list of authorized users. /reload â€“ Refresh the list of admins in the group. /buttons â€“ Toggle playback buttons display. /thumb â€“ Toggle thumbnail display. /autoend [on/off] â€“ Automatically ends voice chats when no one is listening. /channelplay [off | reply to channel message] â€“ Connect Group to a channel.
BotDevsCommands: Bot Developer Commands: /stats â€“ Show bot usage statistics. /logger â€“ Enable or disable logging. /broadcast [reply] â€“ Broadcast a message to all users and chats. /activevc â€“ Show currently active voice chats. /clearallassistants - clear ALL assistant associations.
